actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the importation into the United States of certain agricultural products of Cuba, to include citrus, winter vegetables, and tropical fruits until after 1989.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to prohibit the importation of any Cuban agricultural articles prior to January 1, 1990. Specifies those articles included in such prohibition.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the importation into the United States of certain agricultural products of Cuba, to include citrus, winter vegetables, and tropical fruits until after 1989.
